page.title: 07INDUSTRY ON BANKS OF TAFF
page.content:
List of industry (contd)
{r) Reardon Smith Line}- shipping worldwide. {s) Hurst and Jones Joinery}- sell oil and petrol {t) Brains Beer}- offices (local beer) {u) E. England Potatoes. {v) E. England (Industry)}- repair work {w) Bonded Warehouse}- sell wines and spirits. {x) Empty Buildings}- Prouds Engineering, Cardiff Grain Ltd., Erection and Welding, Westgate Refrigeration.
Industries on the{West bank of the {River Taff}-{Avanna Bakery (179758)} {Grangetown Laundrette (177757) {Turners the Builders (176753) {Lex Meads Motors (182755)}- car accessories and garage.
